concept.definition: The device is working or switched on, i.e. active.
The device is inactive, switched off, or deactivated.
The device is in stand-by mode i.e. not actively working but not powered off.
The device is defective or for maintenance and is not available or working.
The operational status of the device has not been determined.

description: The operational status of the device.
name: FHIRDeviceOperationalStatus

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-operationalstatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
on OnThe device is working or switched on, i.e. active.
off OffThe device is inactive, switched off, or deactivated.
standby Stand ByThe device is in stand-by mode i.e. not actively working but not powered off.
defective Stand ByThe device is defective or for maintenance and is not available or working.
unknown UnknownThe operational status of the device has not been determined.

title: FHIRDeviceOperationalStatus
